item.description: 1px brush hotkey; margins are back; fixed layer keys.
Image display switched back from square to fill; all buttons removed; fixed brush size not updated on revert; export dialog removed.
Switched to bicubic (bilinear caused artifacts on Windows); fixed cursor size not updating on resolution change; fixed extra refreshes when drawing.
Fixed color picker in fullscreen on Windows (Wayland partially fixed); pick from active layer.
Image display changed to square; buttons added.
